text: The Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine (PFLP) is a Palestinian revolutionary group founded in 1967 by George Habash. It is the second largest group forming the Palestine Liberation Organization. == Related pages == * Abu Ali Mustafa Brigades == References == Category:Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine Category:1967 establishments in Asia Category:Palestinian political violence Category:Secularism in Palestine Category:Marxism Category:Communism Category:Anti-imperialism Category:Anti- Zionism Category:Hamas allies Category:Political parties in Palestine Category:Palestinian militant groups
title: Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine
